mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_GALLERY (NUM, WRITER, CAPTION, IMAGEPATH, REGDATE) VALUES (BOARD_GALLERY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{caption}, #{imagePath}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT NUM, WRITER, CAPTION, IMAGEPATH, REGDATE, TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate, LAG(NUM, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY NUM DESC) nextNum, LEAD(NUM, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY NUM DESC) prevNum FROM BOARD_GALLERY) result1 WHERE NUM = #{num}
